question_text: Which of the following BEST describes the failover process in a load-balanced dual power supply configuration?
answer_options: Power is completely shut off and restarted from backup
The remaining power supply continues operation with full load
A UPS takes over for both supplies during failover
One supply draws power from the other before resuming load
correct_answer: The remaining power supply continues operation with full load
explanation: In load-balanced redundancy, both supplies handle 50% load. If one fails, the other seamlessly takes on 100% of the systemâ€™s power demand.
